title:u/pandapaxxy's Returning (in Season of the Dawn) weapons controller breakdown.
description:Originally found at https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/eazaru/returning_weapons_controller_breakdown/

//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / Controller): "In any PvE situation you can make do with quite a lot, but mag increasing perks and handling perks are very helpful." Recommended MW: Reload. Updated Jan 2021.|tags:pve,controller

// Jack Queen King 3 (PvE / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / controller): "In PvE it can have some really interesting rolls, but the lack of Outlaw or Feeding Frenzy will mean a lot of players won’t gravitate towards it." Recommended MW: Reload.

// Jack Queen King 3 (PvP / controller)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / controller): "Having better base stats than a Waking Vigil almost across the board will mean god rolls of this gun will see much more play. Unfortunately Waking Vigil will take the cake for best trait perks of Opening Shot and Slideshot." Recommended MW: Range or Stability.

// Jack Queen King 3 (PvP / controller)

//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / controller): "There really isn’t anything Traveler’s Judgement 5 does better than say Last Dance or Last Hope, but the fact that it has Rapid Hit makes it unique compared to the others.
